segments.text: From my angle, I can see the boy's determination to reach those cookies is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches so far I fear he might topple over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his little fingers barely grazing the edge of the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a tiny acrobat performing a risky stunt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the girl’s expectant posture, her hand raised, just amplifies the tension in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman doesn’t sense the brewing disaster behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the cookies seem to mock the situation, sitting there just out of reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a simple kitchen, but right now it feels like a stage for a drama unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if the stool tips? Will they both fall into the puddle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serenity of the outside garden feels miles away from the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
